description:
While Ichigo is looking into a possible Hollow incident in the World of the Living, Kon, inside Ichigo’s body, meets a beautiful woman who can see spirits. But the woman was dumped by her boyfriend because of this power and now wishes to die. Kon tries to stop the woman from killing herself when a handsome Hollow appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kon l`a vu. Le secret d`une jolie femme de bureau
Secret of a Beautiful Office Lady
